Agent.text:
Thank you for downloading Character Respecialization v1.6!
The module is now installed and working properly! Please check back with the project's homepage often for more updates and feedback.
New in v1.6: - Added Raven to most of the primary locations throughout the world, including Lothering, Orzammar, Redcliffe, Denerim, Circle of Magi docks, Dalish Camp, Ostagar. - Added confirmation dialog to prevent accidental character respecs. - Added welcome screen to show latest updates and show that the addin is loaded and working properly. - Added a couple of RP lines for fun :)
Enjoy
